an5.141:1.3: Datva avajanati, samvasena avajanati, adheyyamukho hoti, lolo hoti, mando momuho hoti.
an5.141:2.7: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo datva avajanati.
an5.141:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, puggalo puggalena saddhim samvasati dve va tini va vassani.
an5.141:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samvasena avajanati.
an5.141:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo parassa vanne va avanne va bhasiyamane tam khippanneva adhimuccita hoti.
an5.141:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo adheyyamukho hoti.
an5.141:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ittarasaddho hoti ittarabhatti ittarapemo ittarappasado.
an5.141:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo lolo hoti.
an5.141:6.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momuho hoti?
an5.141:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo kusalakusale dhamme na janati, savajjanavajje dhamme na janati, hinappanite dhamme na janati, kanhasukkasappatibhage dhamme na janati.
an5.141:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo mando momuho hoti.
an5.141:6.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
